Content:: The Men's 470 Class Competition was a sailing event on the program at the 1996 Summer Olympics that was held from 24 July to 1 August 1996 in Savannah, Georgia, United States. Points were awarded for placement in each race. Eleven races were scheduled and sailed. Each team had two discards.[1] Black: Marinas Blue: Alpha course Green: Bravo course Yellow: Charly course Red: Delta course Olympic course ZI. S(Start) - 1 - 2 - 3 - 2 - 3 - 2 - 3 - F(Finish reaching) Olympic course XI. S(Start) - 1 - 4G - 1 - 4G - 1 - 2 - 3 - F(Finish reaching) Olympic course ZO.
